name: Bishop
body: Bishop is a Webmachine-like framework for Clojure. The primary goal of this project is to make it much easier to construct a clean, HTTP 1.1 compliant web-based API. With this ground-work laid, it will be much easier for the developer to construct REST-ful or even HATEOAS compliant services.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
